articles.author: Harry Baker
articles.title: Dying SpaceX rocket creates eerie 'dashed' line in new photos. What's going on? - Space.com
articles.description: New images show a glowing "dashed" line in the night sky above Arizona after part of a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket fell back to Earth following a double-header launch.
